title: A very annoying Garen problem. Please fix this.
body: Garen ult is a point and click ult but flashes can somehow dodge it. I have at least 3 times of experience of enemy flashing 0.5 sec later after i ulted them then they dont take damage even though garen did his ult animation and ult sound and the ult doesn't go on cooldown as if i never press it before. I never have this problem with other point and click ult such as darius ult. Anyone else have this experience? WTF RITO!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: I think you'll find, that Garen IS the problem.
You're just jelly of Garen big sword which your father never gave you.

Ill tell you what I'm jealous of:
Being unkillable yet still able to completely remove the AP and AD carry from the game with no risk to yourself.

when a champion that requires _negative_ skill to use has a targetable 1500 true damage ult and 5000+ HP (yet somehow still retaining all their AD damage) they become whats called...  a 'mistake'
Garen has plenty of counterplay despite his strengths just know how to abuse it.

I love Garen, he's such an unsophisticated meathead. When he shines his sword and says "forward!" I have to giggle. And when he says "stay resolute!" it usually means he is running for his life, haha.

Yeah that ult issue could be a bug, you might want to report it on the NA boards where they have a bug section. You can sign in using your OCE account [there](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com).
Just done that but thanks for the advice anyway.
Even though it doesn't say it, Garen's ult is actually a short channel. If a champion leaves the ult range before the channel finishes, nothing happens.
Ok that's probably what happen to me.
